abstract: Sports analysis; Big East's future in football hinges on how Big 12 reacts after Missouri's expected move to Southeastern Conference; Big East will survive in some form, as it is still the best basketball league in the country, but the next few weeks will prove critical.
snippet: The Big East is muddling through the Big Wait. Everything hinges on how the Big 12 will react after Missouri’s expected move to the Southeastern Conference.
lead_paragraph: The Big East is muddling through the Big Wait. Everything hinges on how the Big 12 will react after Missouri’s expected move to the Southeastern Conference.

headline.main: Big East’s Fate: Others Control Ball
headline.print_headline: Big East’s Fate: Others Control Ball
headline.seo: Big East’s Football Fate: Others Control the Ball
